meanings.sent1: The footer scored a goal during the match.
meanings.sent2: The team captain congratulated the footer on their performance.
meanings.sent3: The footer's fancy footwork impressed the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The footer's speed on the field was like lightning.
meanings.sent5: The young footer dreams of playing professionally one day.

meanings.definition: The bottom margin of a document or webpage.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to include page numbers in the footer of your report.
meanings.sent2: The website designer added a copyright notice to the footer.
meanings.sent3: The footer of the webpage contained important contact information.
meanings.sent4: The footer of the document was decorated with a floral pattern.
meanings.sent5: The footer of the email had a link to unsubscribe from the mailing list.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to 12 inches.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter measured the board using a footer.
meanings.sent2: The fabric was sold by the yard, not by the footer.
meanings.sent3: The footer of the ruler was slightly worn from use.
meanings.sent4: She estimated the height of the tree to be about six footers.
meanings.sent5: The banner was designed to be exactly three footers long.
